review: Freaking LOVE LOVE LOVE MY NEW FIRE STICK!!! Haven't stopped watching it since I got it!!!
author: Delta wilson

review: I use it everyday! It's always on so I jist turn on my tv and it'll be ready to go. Awesome buy!
author: hieu cao

review: Easy to install, easy to use.  Fully recommended!
author: Carl McGuire

review: love it! Easy to set up, easy to use. Going to get another.
author: S. Brew

review: Works well with our TV. Easy to set up. Only downside is if you are not a prime member and you accidentally select a Prime movie it will, without warning, start it and bill your amazon account for a Prime membership.
author: Kevin Ferguson

review: The fire stick is perfect for us! We love it. Its easy to use, tnere's terrific selections of things to watch & we can watch when WE have the time. Not that there was anthing wrong with Netflix, we just never got around to watching what we ordered & now anything we think we might want to see is always ready when we are. Loving my Fire Stick!
author: C. Bender

review: Wow!!! Just what I needed for my Netflix account. Much better watching on 55inch screen than on my tablet.
author: Ron Morrow

review: easy  to install, now I can watch Amazon prime shows and not have to sit through the commercials that cable tv has!
author: book reader "wheres text to speech"
